name: Box Shooter: New World
description:
You are a researcher studying the geological content of the mysterious planet, Neptune, when a meteor shower forces you to evacuate. 

Gameplay: Use the mouse to point your cannon and click to blast the meteors out of the sky before they crush the delicate layer of rock standing between you and the deadly sea of liquid diamonds below. Use the arrow keys to run toward your space craft in the distance.

This is the very first complete game that I made by myself. I created it in my first game design class. Box Shooter: New World turned out to be very different from the game my professor had originally asked us to create (Box Shooter), so I wanted to show it off! Right now, it is only one level, but I may create more later.

The only thing that I did not create myself is the audio. I downloaded the free Footstep (Snow and Grass) and Grenade Sound FX audio packages from the Unity Asset Store.
